ProductInfo.Features:
Image sensor: Color CCD. Signal system: NTSC
Lens: Built-in 4-9mm Varifocal lens. Horizontal resolution: 420 TVL
Infrared LED: 17 IR illuminators. Minimum Illumination: 0.0 LUX (IR LED on)
Lens allow 355 degree horizontal and 45 degree vertical rotation for adjustment
Weatherproof housing designed for outdoor indoor application. The heavy-duty case concealed wiring protecting the camera from vandalism
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu IR Infrared Dome Security Camera Outdoor Weatherproof Day Night 4-9mm Varifocal Lens for CCTV Home Surveillance DVR System with Preamp Microphone, Audio Video Power Cable and Power Supply CNM
